parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Trims a [[String|string]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[trim]] stringValue

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> stringValue: [[String]] - string to be trimmed. spaces, tabs and line returns are removed from both ends of ''stringValue''.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - trimmed string

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> string [[trim]] [chars, where]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> string: [[String]] - string to be trimmed

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> chars: [[String]] - list of characters to be trimmed

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> where: [[Number]] - Can be:
* 0 - trim at the beginning (left) and the end (right)
* 1 - trim at the beginning (left)
* 2 - trim at the end (right)

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - trimmed string

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[trim]] "		hello, how are you?  "; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns "hello, how are you?"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>"hewosentence!123" [[trim]] ["3e1o2hw", 0]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns "sentence!"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[select]]
</value></part></template></root>
